item.title: [Non-Renamed] Quest Tab Interface
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“Khan_ZooZoo, post:15, topic:305406”]I get errors saying it cant find CustomSpriteLoader symbol. Help?

Edit: fixed. No errors. But doesn’t appear in-game? Still the same. =/

Here is the CustomSpriteLoader: Credits to mahfuz, I think

private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 CustomSpriteLoader(int i, String s) { long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8) + (long)i; Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l); if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null) { return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1; } try { class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Sprites/Interfaces/Custom/"+s+" "+i+".png"); aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2); } catch(Exception exception) { return null; } return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1; } [/quote]

Here you go use mine.

private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 CustomSpriteLoader(int i, String s) { long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8) + (long)i; Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l); if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null) { return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1; } try { class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Files/interface/Custom/"+s+" "+i+".png"); aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2); } catch(Exception exception) { return null; } return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1; }

Use that.

EDIT: Shit forgot spirits add these.
http://uppit.com/v/T7G1BL73

Read full topic

item.description:
@Khan_ZooZoo wrote:

I get errors saying it cant find CustomSpriteLoader symbol. Help?

Edit: fixed. No errors. But doesn’t appear in-game? Still the same. =/

Here is the CustomSpriteLoader: Credits to mahfuz, I think

private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 CustomSpriteLoader(int i, String s) { long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8) + (long)i; Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l); if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null) { return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1; } try { class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Sprites/Interfaces/Custom/"+s+" "+i+".png"); aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2); } catch(Exception exception) { return null; } return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1; }

item.title: [Non-Renamed] Quest Tab Interface
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

Add this

questtab(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);

Under

aClass44 = aClass44

Add these methods

public static void addText9(int id, String text, Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 wid[], int idx, int color, String s) { Class9 Tab = addTab(id); Tab.anInt250 = id; Tab.anInt236 = id; Tab.anInt262 = 4; Tab.anInt217 = 1; Tab.anInt220 = 174; Tab.anInt267 = 11; Tab.anInt214 = 0; Tab.aByte254 = 0; Tab.anInt230 = -1; Tab.aBoolean223 = false; Tab.aBoolean268 = true; Tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_243 = wid[idx]; Tab.aString248 = text; Tab.aString228 = ""; Tab.anInt232 = color; Tab.anInt219 = 0; Tab.anInt216 = 0; Tab.anInt239 = 0; Tab.aString221 = s; } public static void addInterfaceSprite(int i, int j, int k, String s) { Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9(); class9.anInt250 = i; class9.anInt236 = i; class9.anInt262 = 5; class9.anInt217 = 1; class9.anInt214 = 0; class9.anInt220 = 1; class9.anInt267 = 1; class9.aByte254 = 0; class9.anInt230 = 52; class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(j, "Custom"); class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(k, "Custom"); class9.aString221 = s; } public static void addTextCentered(int id, String text, Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 wid[], int idx, int color, int width) { Class9 Tab = addTab(id); Tab.anInt250 = id; Tab.anInt236 = id; Tab.anInt262 = 4; Tab.anInt217 = 0; Tab.anInt220 = width; Tab.anInt267 = 20; Tab.anInt214 = 0; Tab.aByte254 = 0; Tab.anInt230 = -1; Tab.aBoolean223 = true; Tab.aBoolean268 = true; Tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_243 = wid[idx]; Tab.aString248 = text; Tab.aString228 = ""; Tab.anInt232 = color; Tab.anInt219 = 0; Tab.anInt216 = 0; Tab.anInt239 = 0; }

Then add this with your other interfaces.

[code]public static void questtab(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) {
Class9 class9 = addTab(638);
/* addInterfaceSprite(ID, SpriteON, SpriteOFF, “Sprite”) */
addInterfaceSprite(29950, 4000, 4000, “Sprite”);// screen
addInterfaceSprite(29951, 4000, 4000, “Sprite”);// screen
addInterfaceSprite(29952, 4000, 4000, “Sprite”);// screen

	/* addText(ID, "Text", ???, Size, Colour); */
	addTextCentered(29954, "Name here", wid, 2, 0xff9040, 190);
	addTextCentered(29953, "Name here", wid, 2, 0xff9040, 190);
	addText(682, "Quest Points: 1337", wid, 2, 0xff9040);

	addText(663, "", wid, 0, 0xff9040);
	addText(7332, "", wid, 0, 0xff9040);

	addText(7334, "frame1", wid, 0, 0xff9040);
	addText(13337, "Frame2", wid, 0, 0xff9040);
	addText9(7339, "Quest", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here1");
	addText9(7340, "Quest2", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here2");
	addText9(7346, "Quest3", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here3");
	addText9(7341, "Quest4", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here4");
	addText9(7342, "", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here5");
	addText9(7337, "Quest6", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here6");
	addText9(7336, "", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here7");
	addText9(7338, "", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here8");
	addText9(7335, "Quest9", wid, 0, 0xff9040, "Quest Here9");

	class9.anInt261 = 0;
	class9.aBoolean266 = false;
	class9.anIntArray240 = new int[19];
	class9.anIntArray241 = new int[19];
	class9.anIntArray272 = new int[19];

	class9.anIntArray240[0] = 29954;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[0] = 0;
	class9.anIntArray272[0] = 2;

	class9.anIntArray240[1] = 29950;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[1] = 0;
	class9.anIntArray272[1] = 18;

	class9.anIntArray240[2] = 29951;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[2] = 0;
	class9.anIntArray272[2] = 52;

	class9.anIntArray240[3] = 29952;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[3] = 0;
	class9.anIntArray272[3] = 238;

	class9.anIntArray240[4] = 29953;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[4] = 0;
	class9.anIntArray272[4] = 57;

	class9.anIntArray240[5] = 663;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[5] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[5] = 24;

	class9.anIntArray240[6] = 7332;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[6] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[6] = 39;

	class9.anIntArray240[7] = 682;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[7] = 6;
	class9.anIntArray272[7] = 244;

	class9.anIntArray240[8] = 7339;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[8] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[8] = 73;

	class9.anIntArray240[9] = 7340;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[9] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[9] = 88;

	class9.anIntArray240[10] = 7346;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[10] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[10] = 103;

	class9.anIntArray240[11] = 7341;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[11] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[11] = 118;

	class9.anIntArray240[12] = 7342;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[12] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[12] = 133;

	class9.anIntArray240[13] = 7337;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[13] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[13] = 148;

	class9.anIntArray240[14] = 7336;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[14] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[14] = 163;

	class9.anIntArray240[15] = 7338;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[15] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[15] = 178;

	class9.anIntArray240[16] = 7335;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[16] = 5;
	class9.anIntArray272[16] = 193;

	class9.anIntArray240[17] = 13337;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[17] = 5 + 76;
	class9.anIntArray272[17] = 208;

	class9.anIntArray240[18] = 7334;// screen
	class9.anIntArray241[18] = 5 + 80;
	class9.anIntArray272[18] = 221;

}[/code]

Some one test this please I might have left something out.
